task.title: Temporarily Repairing a Radiator Leak
task.shortdesc: Apply a temporary fix to a leaking radiator using readily available materials.

context.p: When you discover a small radiator leak and need an immediate temporary repair.

choices.choice: Apply brown soap to the leak
Apply white lead to the leak

result.p: The leak will be temporarily sealed.

postreq.note: Schedule a permanent solder repair as soon as possible.
